context: hi , do you know much about presidents ? i know they live in the white house ! did you know the white house is smaller than the guest house ? nice . is that also true in ireland and france , where they have twin white house buildings ? yeah but i do wonder if they presidents live in those houses or not yeah , and since the white house still uses floppy disks , is this also true at the twin white houses ? good point . i wonder if they use the floppy discs because they might still be safer good question . perhaps , since teddy roosevelt banned christmas trees from the white house , perhaps bush issued an executive order against cds ? well , it could be . good thing he brought back the solar panels though true . although in 2011 , bullets struck the white house . it took the secret service 4 days to realize it . i wonder if the solar panels were damaged ? good point and strange that they did not figure that out earlier well , maybe they did n't notice because they were all inside listening to the latest pop music release from the president of indonesia ? haha good point . did not know the guy released 3 albums already the guy is a machine ! but he needs a better stage name . maybe president banana ? i do not think the president of zimbabwe would be happy about that he could be the artist formerly known as president banana ? i do n't really care as long as i can listen to him on the radio ! i love two things on my radio : indonesian pop music and electromagnetic storms from jupiter . those are my go to listening pleasures ! yeah that is so cool that if you turn your radio to am , you may capture jupiter 's storms   i wonder how jupiter gets around the law in canada , where stations are required to play at least 40 % of their content from canadian artists . does jupiter have to book canadian storms ?
response: i wonder how jupiter gets around the law in canada , where stations are required to play at least 40 % of their content from canadian artists . does jupiter have to book canadian storms ?

Dialogue Context:
hi , do you know much about presidents ? i know they live in the white house ! did you know the white house is smaller than the guest house ? nice . is that also true in ireland and france , where they have twin white house buildings ? yeah but i do wonder if they presidents live in those houses or not yeah , and since the white house still uses floppy disks , is this also true at the twin white houses ? good point . i wonder if they use the floppy discs because they might still be safer good question . perhaps , since teddy roosevelt banned christmas trees from the white house , perhaps bush issued an executive order against cds ? well , it could be . good thing he brought back the solar panels though true . although in 2011 , bullets struck the white house . it took the secret service 4 days to realize it . i wonder if the solar panels were damaged ? good point and strange that they did not figure that out earlier well , maybe they did n't notice because they were all inside listening to the latest pop music release from the president of indonesia ? haha good point . did not know the guy released 3 albums already the guy is a machine ! but he needs a better stage name . maybe president banana ? i do not think the president of zimbabwe would be happy about that he could be the artist formerly known as president banana ? i do n't really care as long as i can listen to him on the radio ! i love two things on my radio : indonesian pop music and electromagnetic storms from jupiter . those are my go to listening pleasures ! yeah that is so cool that if you turn your radio to am , you may capture jupiter 's storms   i wonder how jupiter gets around the law in canada , where stations are required to play at least 40 % of their content from canadian artists . does jupiter have to book canadian storms ?

Fact:
according to canadian law , all radios are required to have at least 40 % of the music played be canadian .


Response:
i wonder how jupiter gets around the law in canada , where stations are required to play at least 40 % of their content from canadian artists . does jupiter have to book canadian storms ?
